law.catch_line: and responding tribunal of this state.
law.text: Under KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902, a tribunal of this state may serve as an initiating tribunal to forward proceedings to another state and as a responding tribunal for proceedings initiated in another state or a foreign country.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 6, effective June 24, 2015. -- Contingent effective date repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 20, effective March 23, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 18, effective upon contingency.
